amendment.description: Amendment establishes that research conducted is consistent with the definition of basic research as it applies to the purpose and field of study and is in the national interest of the United States.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A003) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
